backend/main.mo: Defines the main game canister with user profiles, lobbies, challenges, match results, authorization checks, and lobby creation logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps the old actor state to the new actor format with no transformations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing UI, routing, hooks, and terminal-themed components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color tokens and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save a display name.
Countdown timer component showing remaining time with urgency styling.
Displays lobby players with host identification in a terminal-styled list.
frontend/src/components/game/TerminalPan: Interactive terminal UI handling command input, history, autocomplete, and output rendering for challenges.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and container styling.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the global application version string.
frontend/src/content/updates.ts: Provides changelog entries for the Updates page as static data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing it on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Wrapper hook exposing whether the actor is ready for use.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, lobbies, matches, and terminal command processing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining terminal-themed colors, effects, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero text, solo mode navigation, and multiplayer lobby creation with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays global leaderboard and recent matches with authentication-aware notices and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows lobby details, handles joining, leaving, starting matches, copying lobby codes, and auto-refreshing lobby state.
frontend/src/pages/MatchPage.tsx: Runs an active match with command processing, challenge display, timers, scoreboards, and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows final score and mode after a match with options to play again or return home.
frontend/src/pages/SoloGamePage.tsx: Manages solo-game initialization, polling for lobby readiness, processing commands, and tracking score and state.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Renders the Updates page showing app version and a styled list of update entries with dates and change logs.
frontend/src/utils/parseIcError.ts: Converts various IC and backend error messages into user-friendly strings, handling common canister, auth, lobby, and network issues.
Utility to unwrap Candid optional tuple-array values, returning the inner value or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project's retro terminal aesthetic.
project_state.json: Contains the projectâ€™s current state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for build planning.
